testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-delay:-2s can implement animation-delay function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-delay:-2s can implement delay function normally
step.expected: A colored Square Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears which starts moving from right to left as soon as the page loads

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-delay:5s can implement animation-delay function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-delay:-5s can implement delay function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears which starts to animate from right to left after 5 seconds from the time page is loaded

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-delay with offset value 0s can implement animation-delay function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-delay with offset value 0s can implement delay function normally
step.expected: A colored Square Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears which starts to animate/move from right to left as soon as the page loads

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-direction specified as alternate can implement animation-direction function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-direction specified as alternate can implement animation-direction function normally
step.expected: Colored Square Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" inside it appears which moves from right to left on page load; then, it moves from left to right. This cycle keeps repeating itself

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-direction specified as normal can implement animation-direction function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-direction specified as normal can implement animation-direction function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears which starts from right and moves towards left, again it positions itself back to right and moves towards left. This cycle gets repeated

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-duration value is set blank can implement animation-duration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-duration value is set blank can implement animation-duration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears and NO animation is seen. Also no red should be visible

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-duration value has a finite value can implement animation-duration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-duration value has a finite value can implement animation-duration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears which starts moving from right to left upon page load and lasts for A span of 10seconds

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-duration with negative value can implement animation-duration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-duration with negative value can implement animation-duration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears and NO animation is seen. Also no red should be visible on this page

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-duration value set to 0 (zero) can implement animation-duration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-duration value set to 0 (zero) can implement animation-duration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears and NO animation is seen. Also no red should be visible on this page.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-iteration-count is not set and testing for default value can implement animation-iteration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-iteration-count is not set and testing for default value can implement animation-iteration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears which starts to animate/move from right to left ONCE

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-iteration-count set to infinite can implement animation-iteration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-iteration-count set to infinite can implement animation-iteration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears and repeatedly moves from right to left. Every time A cycle is finished, the box gets re-positioned to right and continues to move left

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-iteration-count set to non-integer can implement animation-iteration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-iteration-count set to non-integer can implement animation-iteration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" animates from right to left along the green bar THRICE (for A span of 10 seconds each) and for the FOURTH time animation appears to break in middle and the box immediately positions itself to left

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-iteration-count set to a finite value can implement animation-iteration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-iteration-count set to a finite value can implement animation-iteration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears and box starts to animate/move from right to left twice

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-iteration-count set to zero can implement animation-iteration function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-iteration-count set to zero can implement animation-iteration function normally
step.expected: A blue colored Box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears and NO movement/animation is seen. Also, RED color should NOT be seen anywhere on this page

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: Check if the 'animationiteration' event occurs at the end of each iteration of an animation when the animation-iteration-count is greater than one.

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to verify if 'animationiteration' event occurs at the end of each iteration of an animation when the animation-iteration-count is greater than one
step.expected: The box moves from Right to Left for a period of 10 seconds. It should contain a digit 1 for first animation. Content of box changes to 2 during second animation. Also the animation should stop after the 2rd cycle.

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: Check that the animation-name fucntion can be impelemented normally if it is set to valid keyframes rule name.

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check that the animation-name fucntion can be impelemented normally if it is set to valid keyframes rule name.
step.expected: A blue box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" inside it appears and animates/moves towards left

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-name set to none can implement animation-name function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-name set to none can implement animation-name function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" inside it appears and should not animate/move towards left. Also no red should be visible on this page

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: check if animation-name value are none any keyframe at-rule can implement animation-name function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-name value are none any keyframe at-rule can implement animation-name function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" inside it appears and should not animate/move towards left. Also no red should be visible on this page

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-name does not match any keyframe at-rule can implement animation-name function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-name does not match any keyframe at-rule can implement animation-name function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" inside it appears and should not animate/move towards left. Also no red should be visible on this page

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-play-state set to paused can implement animation-play-state function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-play-state set to paused can implement animation-play-state function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears and NO animation is seen. Also no red color should be visible on this page

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-play-state set to playing can implement animation-play-state function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-play-state set to playing can implement animation-play-state function normally
step.expected: A blue colored box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" appears which moves from right to left (in 10seconds) upon page load

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: Check that the animation-timing-function can be implemented normally if it is set to cubic-bezier with parameters (0,0,1,1).

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check that animation-timing-function can be implemented if it is set to cubic-bezier with parameters (0,0,1,1).
step.expected: Blue box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" moves from right to left with constant speed

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-timing-function set to set to ease can implement animation-timing-function function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-timing-function set to set to ease can implement animation-timing-function function normally
step.expected: Blue box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" moves from right to left; initially the animation starts slow, then gains acceleration in the middle and again slows down at the end

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-timing-function set to ease-in can implement animation-timing-function function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-timing-function set to ease-in can implement animation-timing-function function normally
step.expected: Blue box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" moves from right to left; animation starts slow then gains acceleration as time progresses

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-timing-function set to ease-in-out can implement animation-timing-function function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-timing-function set to ease-in-out can implement animation-timing-function function normally
step.expected: Blue box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" moves from right to left; initially the animation starts slow, then gains acceleration in the middle and again slows down at the end

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-timing-function set to ease-out can implement animation-timing-function function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-timing-function set to ease-out can implement animation-timing-function function normally
step.expected: Blue box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" moves from right to left, animation starts then relatively slows down as time progresses

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Animations Module Level 3
testcase.purpose: To check if that animation-timing-function set to linear can implement animation-timing-function function normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if animation-timing-function set to linear can implement animation-timing-function function normally
step.expected: Blue box with text "CSS3 Testing Content" moves from right to left with constant speed
